summary: Repopulate Skyrim with the People of Mushrooms...Wild, Single Followers, Dual Followers, Armies of Mushrooms !
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Repopulate Skyrim with the People of Mushrooms[/size][/b][/color]...Wild, Single Followers, Dual Followers, Armies of Mushrooms !

[color=#00ff00]Version 1.1[/color] (No DLC) and [color=#00ff00][i]Version 3.5[/i][/color] ([i]DLC Dragonborn required[/i])

[color=#00ff00]Optional file: Esp version Fr. pour 1.1 et [i] pour 3.5[/i][/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Dtv78LT.gif[/img]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Single Followers, Dual Followers[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=7785324SingleFollowersbis.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/7785324SingleFollowersbis.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=3732984DualFollowersbis.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/3732984DualFollowersbis.jpg[/img][/url]

To have the Summonable Mushrooms,you must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the books (Normally this is done automatically)

You can find the “Spell tome XXXX",at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whitherun) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

With the books you have the spells....Then summon the Mushrooms...

If you have not bought the book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the book, etc

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=237058Farengar.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/237058Farengar.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Armies of Mushrooms[/size] [/color] (The "babies" Giant Mushrooms are only in the version 3.5)

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of MUSHROOMS (5, 15, 50, MORE ? ...[color=#ff0000]ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer ![/color])

To obtain these eggs, simply bring the “MUSHROOM Egg” found with some merchants in [color=#00ff00]WHITERUN[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i][/b]) ; in [color=#00ff00]SOLITUDE[/color]([b][i]Merchants: Angeline at Angeline’s Aromatics, Corpulus at Winking Skeever, Sayma at Bits and Pieces, Addvar[/i][/b]) ; in [color=#00ff00]WINDHELM[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Elda at the Candlehearth, Ambarys at the Corner Club, Quintus at the White Phial, Revyn Sadri, Hillevi[/i][/b]) ; in [color=#00ff00]RIFTEN[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Keeravia at the Bee and Barb, Elgrim at Elgrim’s Elixirs, Marise Aravel, Vekel at the Ragged Flagorn in the Ratways [/i][/b]); in [color=#00ff00]MARKARTH[/color] ([b][i]Merchants: Kleppr in the Silver Blood Inn and Bothela in the Hags Cure [/i][/b]) and in [color=#00ff00]RAVEN ROCK [/color](Solstheim) ([b][i]Merchants: Fethis, Garyn and Milore, near the forge [/i][/b]) to a forge and create the "Incubated MUSHROOM Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Mushrooms.

Some of these little creatures can follow you ! Others prefer to stay behind to repopulate Skyrim. It is for you to discover which ....

The "babies" Giant Mushrooms are timid and are not fighting in general !

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55592/?]Incubated Eggs[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76666/?]Curious Birds Mounts and Armies [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76681/?]Chimeras Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76864/?]New Gryphons Mounts and Armies[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73785/?]Griffins Mounts and Armies[/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68187/?]Gerbils Mounts and Followers [/url],[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68832/?] Skaven Mounts and Followers [/url]or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55520/?] Incubated Winged Chocobos [/url], in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=256367ArmiesofMushrooms.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/256367ArmiesofMushrooms.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Giant Mushrooms Followers[/size][/color] (Only with the version 3.5 [i]DLC Dragonborn required[/i])

You can talk (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) to the 9 Giant Mushrooms Followers near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun) and (if you have my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim [/url]) near the Mushroom House

You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=316783GiantMushroomsFollowers.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/316783GiantMushroomsFollowers.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4] MushSpiders[/size][/color] (Only with the version 3.5 [i]DLC Dragonborn required[/i])

Mount, Eggs, Wild...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=888925MushSpiders.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/888925MushSpiders.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Wild[/size][/color]

18 ([i]or 24[/i]) different Mushrooms near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun) and (if you have my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim [/url]) around the Mushroom House

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=4797967wildbis.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/4797967wildbis.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Mushroom House[/size] [/color] (Additional Mod - Standalone Mod)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?] NEXUS[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=717202080] STEAM[/url]


Video by [color=#ff0000]Just Call Me Frosty/laiilaiiheii [/color](with my two mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76818/?]Snails and Slugs of Skyrim [/url]+ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77311/?]Repopulate with Mushrooms [/url])

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]XZgwCY8dqXU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-


[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=998323SnailsslugsandSnaianssteam.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/998323SnailsslugsandSnaianssteam.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]

For the Meshes of the 42 Mushrooms and the MushSpider, thanks to [color=#ff0000] Vicn[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?] Vicn Creature Pack [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Kahjiit Raj[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16831/?] Golden Egg Treasure Hunt [/url] for the textures (with:Wyeko,struckdumb,super_chicken,bigsteve7743,Enchantedgal,WanderingSoul,kuschelirmel,Wisdoms_Pe,ttainted_sharben)
of the Eggs ("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me")

Thanks to [color=#ff0000] Stroti -Tamira [/color]for the chest in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62787/? ] Stroti's Treehouse Resource [/url]

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00] Angilla[/color] for the Giant Mushroom Throne in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32763/?]Forest Throne - Level Asset [/url] (« Modders resources and tutorials » "Please just post proper credits or a link to the original mod")
